bill.title: Teacher contracts
bill.description: Amend The South Carolina Code Of Laws By Amending Section 59-25-420, Relating To Notices Concerning Annual Teacher Employment Contracts, So As To Provide Contract Acceptances Submitted Before May Eleventh May Be Withdrawn By Submission Of Written Notice To The School District Within Ten Days After Publication Of The School District Salary Schedule For The Upcoming School Year, And To Provide School Districts May Not Report Such Withdrawals As A Breach Of Contract; And By Amending Section 59-25-530, Relating To Unprofessional Conduct And Breach Of Contract By Teachers, So As To Revise The Penalties For Breach Of Contract Resulting From The Unauthorized Execution Of An Employment Contract With Another District, To Revise The Period For Educator Certificate Suspension Due To Breach Of Contract And To Make Such Revocations Discretionary.

history.action: Referred to Committee on Education and Public Works
Referred to Committee on Education and Public Works
